title: Hi, It's My Birthday

embed.description: The best GIFs are on Giphy

body: If you're old enough to know what cartoon this was ... hooray for not being the only dinosaur that plays league. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Katey D:

You never said happy birthday to me in ***my*** happy birthday thread...-cries eternally-

It's me Kinky Ninja Boy btw, I got a name change :D

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/yeGM4LLq-its-my-birthday-today?comment=0005

> [{quoted}](name=Tomb of Insomnia,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=hH8umEZI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-14T21:18:52.974+0000)
>
> Katey D:
> 
> You never said happy birthday to me in ***my*** happy birthday thread...-cries eternally-
> 
> It's me Kinky Ninja Boy btw, I got a name change :D
> 
> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/yeGM4LLq-its-my-birthday-today?comment=0005

Think about why that is, maybe because people don't care to give you attention and what better day to ignore than the day in which you slipped  of the old snaptrap.

Doug.

The good old days of cartoons.
